features: 【COLORED FILE FOLDERS LETTER SIZE】Made from high-quality plastic, these file folders with pockets come in six vibrant colors to help you color-code your files. With a colored file folders capacity of up to 50 sheets of paper, you can easily store all your important documents in one convenient place.

【PERFECT FOR BUSINESS OCCASIONS】Our plastic folders with pockets are designed with functionality in mind. Each file folder features a handy name card slot. Plus, these filing folders are waterproof and tear-resistant, so you can rest assured that your documents will stay safe and secure.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL FILE FOLDERS】Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who likes to stay organized, our file folders are a must-have accessory. Use them to keep track of your bills, receipts, homework assignments, or any other important documents. Folders with pockets are perfect for use at home, school, or the office.

【WATERPROOF & BENDABLE PLASTIC FOLDER】Our plastic folders for documents are not only practical but also very strong and durable. Pocket folders durable construction means they can be used again and again, making them a great investment for the long term.

【QUALITY ASSURANCE】Habgp designed these colored file folders to be the perfect tool for anyone who wants to stay organized and productive. Whatever questions you may have about thesecolored file folders please contact us and we will be sure to give you a satisfactory response.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: These colored file folders are sure to keep your files organized Habgp specializes in the production of various plastic folders. These letter size file folders with pockets are our classic products and they are available in 6 different colors: black, purple, red, yellow, blue and orange. Investing in our pocket folders is a smart choice for anyone looking to stay organized and efficient. Whether you're a student, a small business owner, or just someone who wants to keep their paperwork in order, these folders for documents has everything you need. With its multiple pockets, business card holder, and spacious capacity, you'll wonder how you ever managed without it. Upgrade your filing system today with our reliable and stylish plastic folders with pockets

File folders with pockets and business card holders have a wider range of uses Our versatile and durable plastic folders, designed to meet all your organizational needs. With two pockets and a business card holder, these pocket folders are perfect for storing important documents and keeping your contact information easily accessible. Made to hold up to 50 letter size sheets, these folders for documents are ideal for both personal and professional use.

Rigorous workmanship These plastic folders are amazingly thick, they have smooth edges, and each pocket is made of sturdy heat-pressed technology. Waterproof and easy to clean The plastic file folders are waterproof and scratch-resistant, so even if you accidentally spill some water on them, you can easily wipe them clean. Durable and tear-resistant Plastic folders for documents can be bent without breaking, and they keep your binders and papers safe and organized at all times.

Pocket folders with business card holder Folders with pockets and business card holders are the perfect accessory for business and job seekers, and they keep your information at a glance. Extra Large Capacity Plastic folders with pockets can hold up to 50 sheets of paper, so even if your documents are thick, they can be stored in the same folder. Multifunctional Colored file folders are protectors for all your documents and papers, they are the perfect accessory for business, school, office, and filing cabinets.

Colored file folders make your study or work easier and more enjoyable Not only is our plastic file folder functional, it also comes in 6 vibrant colors to add a pop of personality to your workspace. Choose from black, purple, red, yellow, blue and orange to match your style or color code your files for easy identification. The sturdy plastic material ensures that your documents stay protected and secure, while the sleek design makes pocket folders easy to carry on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Walmart
reviews.reviewText: Great options for when the school requires many different colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These worked so much for my son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for organizing assignments
reviews.reviewText: These two-pocket folders are great for keeping papers organized. My middle school ELA students already have two composition books for my class (one for writing, one for notes), so they don't need a big binder, but they do need a place to store handouts and assignments. I like that these folders are made from flexible plastic so they easily go in and out of backpacks, but they aren't going to fall apart after the first quarter like well-used paper folders do. The opening in the pocket allows for several pages per side and makes them easy to take out and put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars set of 6 plastic folders, good for school & home
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice set of 6 plastic folders. I ordered these for my kids to use at school, but will likely use a couple myself. The size measurements match the description, although you could probably fit a slightly wider piece of paper in the folder, closer to 9 inches, rather than 8.5 inches. The color assortment is slightly different than what is in the pictures. I received a green folder instead of an orange one... but not an issue for me. These are lightweight and easy to pack & use. Overall, they serve their purpose.
